channel.title: Python on Anisha Khatri
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Anisha Khatri

item.title: Local galaxies as time machines: Navigating biases in studying Cosmic Evolution
item.description: Using galaxies as probes to investigate the observational biases that affect the estimation of physical parameters (e.g., stellar masses) in galaxies.

item.title: Flavor Physics: Precision Measurements of CKM Matrix elements
item.description: To extract the CKM matrix element V₍ub₎, the shape parameter α, the form factor normalization f₊(0), and their associated uncertainties for precision flavor physics measurements.

item.title: Spectral lag in gamma-ray bursts
item.description: Estimating the spectral lag in gamma ray bursts to understand its emission mechanism
